channel.title: [317] NzxtScape [317] LOOKING FOR STAFF
channel.description:
[b]This 317 is fairly new and looking for committed players![/b]
Ever felt like your server was too small and your interest was never peaked? At NzxtScape our owners value the servers updates more then food or sleep, things are always interesting, with unique updates DAILY. The players input is always asked for too, which is sweet!
-Godwars -Dung -PC -100% working and updated JAD + FC - All special attacks and weapons animations working - Claws, Ags, ETC - Special attack and GFX effects added to all the recolored whips and bows - EDITED: Balmung. Has GFX, Spec, and a flying animation replaced with the walk/run anim, - Custom Home filled with all the necessities - Skillers can make money by selling their products to General Store - Holiday Events - NPC vs. NPC System - Great Economy set up - Webclient - Hosted on a 4G Dedi - Custom Areas. - Healing Fairy NPC - Ancients, All prayer working for PVP AND PVM - Chaotics, Primal, etc - Training Shop - Fully working Summoning and Hunting - Dicing/Gambling System - Lottery - Donor Zone + Perks and Rank - Two Owners who have proficiency in programming - DAILY UPDATES - FUNPK - 100% Staking at Duel Arena - Barrelchest/KBD/DAGS/GLOD/FROSTDRAGONS and MORE - VBULLETIN FORUMS - Customized PVP Effects - Salamander customized to shoot fire waves as a crossbow - Korasi + Torva - Working Spirit Sheilds! - Corp - Nomad
TO COME THIS WEEK: - A interactive quest in the world of Zanaris - Two new minigames - New customized Item - Updated Donor Perks - City of Guthix developed - And hopefully, YOU!
Everyone who joins from Mopar gets an extra 50m! :)
[24/7 WEBCLIENT] http://www.nzxtscape.com [CLIENT DOWNLOAD] http://www.nzxtscape.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=15&t=5 [VBULLETIN FORUMS] http://www.nzxtscape.com/forums

item.title: [317] NzxtScape [317] LOOKING FOR STAFF
item.dc:creator: @nzxt nzxt
item.description:
@nzxt wrote:

One of my players made the banner and players also recommended the green forums. I do what the players request. Thanks for posting. Will be reposting my own post very soon. + it’s nothing like others. There is a completely different home, lottery system, remade dungoneering skill. Come play, you won’t leave

item.title: [317] NzxtScape [317] LOOKING FOR STAFF
item.dc:creator: @F_A_I_L_S Fails
item.description:
@F_A_I_L_S wrote:

Soulcist:

[ul][li]Terrible looking forums, the color scheme needs to be at least done[/li][/ul]

I don’t know about you all, but the forums is what I look at first. If the forum isn’t well-put together, well, then that tells me the server will be the same way. You must get your priorities straight before you plan on hosting a private server. Don’t rush into things.
Oh, one last thing. Get a new banner. xD

Goodluck, I suppose.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] NzxtScape [317] LOOKING FOR STAFF
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[ul][li]Terrible advertisement[/li]
[li]Terrible looking forums, the color scheme needs to be at least done[/li]
[li]The server SEEMS to be the same as others from what I’m catching-on from the thread[/li]
[li]The forums are still looking bad[/li][/ul]

Good luck with the server though.
